solution_line_template: She will be driving {total_driving_miles} miles for her trip because {round_trip_factor} x {distance_to_sea_world} = <<{round_trip_factor}*{distance_to_sea_world}={total_driving_miles}>>{total_driving_miles}
They will need {gallons_needed} gallons of gas because {total_driving_miles} / {miles_per_gallon} =<<{total_driving_miles}/{miles_per_gallon}={gallons_needed}>>{gallons_needed}
The gas will cost ${total_gas_cost} because {gallons_needed} x {gas_cost_per_gallon} = <<{gallons_needed}*{gas_cost_per_gallon}={total_gas_cost}>>{total_gas_cost}
She needs to save ${amount_to_save_more} more because {total_trip_cost} - {saved_money} = <<{total_trip_cost}-{saved_money}={amount_to_save_more}>>{amount_to_save_more}
